jrtr
Class VertexData

java.lang.Object
  jrtr.VertexData

public class VertexData
extends java.lang.Object

Provides functionality to specify 3D geometry in the form of triangle meshes. VertexData consists of a list of VertexData.VertexElements.

Nested Class Summary
static class VertexData.Semantic
          Vertex data semantic can be position, normal, or texture coordinates.
 class VertexData.VertexElement
          A vertex element is an array of floats that stores vertex attributes, like positions, normals, or texture coordinates.

Constructor Detail

VertexData

public VertexData(int n)
Vertex data consists of a list of vertex elements, and an index array. The index array contains indices into the vertex data. The indices specify how vertices are connected to triangles. I.e., the first three indices define the three vertices of the first triangle, the second three indices the second triangle, etc.

Parameters:
n - the number of vertices.
